content.question: Based on the class specification, which of the following is a true statement about Parcel objects?

choices.label: status and location are attributes; updateStatus and updateLocation are behaviors.
status and location are behaviors; updateStatus and updateLocation are attributes.
status and updateStatus are attributes; location and updateLocation are behaviors.
status and updateStatus are behaviors; location and updateLocation are attributes.

content.answer: status and location are attributes; updateStatus and updateLocation are behaviors.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
